questions.text: When you picture a deeply fulfilling week, what stands out most?

choices.label: Quiet pockets of ease and unhurried time
Quality time with people who matter
Trying new places or experiences
Learning something that expands me

questions.text: Which statement feels most true right now?

choices.label: I want to reconnect with who I am outside of work
I am ready to level up a skill or habit
I want deeper friendships and community
I want to do something useful for others

questions.text: How do you usually spend a free evening?

choices.label: Recharge quietly with rest, reading, or a walk
Call or meet up with someone I care about
Tinker with a hobby or take a short class
Find a low-stakes adventure or new activity

questions.text: What kind of challenge are you craving right now?

choices.label: A structured plan to grow or improve
Something bold that stretches my comfort zone
A chance to help or mentor someone
Simplifying routines to feel calmer

questions.text: Which relationship intention feels most important this month?

choices.label: Initiate meaningful conversations
Create or join a group I can belong to
Set kind boundaries so I have energy for people
Plan one memorable outing with someone

questions.text: How do you want your work to support your life right now?

choices.label: Protect space for rest and routines
Reflect my values and sense of self
Offer growth and learning opportunities
Let me make a positive difference

questions.text: What helps you feel most like yourself?

choices.label: Time with people who truly get me
Exploring a creative or playful impulse
Quiet morning or evening rituals
Investing in a personal skill or craft

questions.text: How do you usually reset after stress?

choices.label: Slow down and do something calming
Connect with a friend or family member
Move my body or change the scene
Reflect on what I am learning and adjust

questions.text: Pick a mini-project that sounds energizing for this month.

choices.label: Build a small skill with a simple plan
Volunteer or help someone directly
Curate a playlist, reading list, or mood board that reflects me
Plan a micro-adventure in my city

questions.text: How adventurous do you feel right now?

choices.label: Very: I want to try bold or new experiences
Moderately: I can stretch a little
Not much: I prefer predictable comfort
It depends: with support, I can try something small

questions.text: Which gives you the strongest sense of meaning right now?

choices.label: Helping others or contributing to a cause
Deepening bonds with people close to me
Becoming the person I want to be
Growing skills I am proud of

questions.text: How do you prefer to learn at the moment?

choices.label: Self-guided reading or online courses
Learning with others or a mentor
Hands-on experiments and field trips
Gentle, reflective journaling or walks

questions.text: Which morning routine would help most right now?

choices.label: A calm start: hydrate, stretch, and a quiet moment
A focused start: plan priorities and one key task
An expressive start: write or create something small
An energizing start: get outside for 10 minutes

questions.text: Which boundary would make the biggest difference this week?

choices.label: Protect time for rest or hobbies
Say no to what is not aligned with my values
Limit distractions when with people I care about
Create a focused block to progress one goal

questions.text: Where do you most want to contribute beyond yourself?

choices.label: Support a community or local cause
Share knowledge or mentor someone
Use my strengths in a way that feels true to me
Join an adventure with a purpose (cleanup, fundraiser, etc.)
